casebody.data:
SHEPARD
v.
OCWEN FEDERAL BANK, et al. No. 476A05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2005. Mallam J. Maynard, Maria D. McIntyre, Charlotte, Chandra T. Taylor, J. Jerome Hartzell, Raleigh, for Wayne & Rosemary Shepard. Matthew T. McKee, for Ocwen Federal Bank, et al. Carlene McNulty, for NC Justice Center, et al. Hazel Mack-Hilliard, Susan Gottsegen, Winston-Salem, for Legal Aid Soc. of Northwest NC. Kenneth L. Schorr, Charlotte, for Legal Ser. of Southern Piedmont. William J. Whalen, for Pisgah Legal Services. Gary W. Jackson, for NC Academy of Trial Lawyers. Seth P. Rosebrock, for Center of Responsible Lending.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 31st day of October 2005 by Defendants for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Defendants (Ocwen Federal Bank, et al.) shall have up to and Including the 12th day of December 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 1st day of November 2005."
